### Ingest the source

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "top-250-tv-shows/imdb_popular.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Wrangle

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}



df$Votes<-as.numeric(gsub("\\,","",df$Votes)) # Just removing the negative 
df$Genre <- as.factor(df$Genre)

summary(df)

```


### Scatter Quadrant Plot

```{r, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

theme_opts <- theme(
    text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 17, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 14),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 8),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "none"
)


v1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x=Year, y=Rating)) +
     annotate("rect", xmin = 1986, xmax = 2009, ymin =8.29 , ymax = 11, fill= "#faba00")  + 
  annotate("rect", xmin = 1986, xmax = 2009, ymin = 2.5, ymax = 8.29, fill= "#009380") + 
  annotate("rect", xmin = 2009, xmax = 2021, ymin = 8.29, ymax = 11, fill= "#a5037d") + 
  annotate("rect", xmin = 2009, xmax = 2021, ymin = 2.5, ymax = 8.29, fill= "#ef8900") +
    annotate("text", x = 1988.5, y=10.5, label= "Old Series\nHigh Rating", color = 'white', fontface = 'bold')+
  annotate("text", x = 1988.5, y=3.3, label= "Old Series\nLow Rating", color = 'white', fontface = 'bold') +
  annotate("text", x = 2018.5, y=10.5, label= "New Series\nHigh Rating", color = 'white', fontface = 'bold') +
  annotate("text", x = 2018.5, y=3.3, label= "New Series\nLow Rating", color = 'white', fontface = 'bold') +
  annotate("text", x = 1994, y=8.2, label= "Mean Rating: 8.29", color = 'white', size = 4) +
  annotate("text", x = 2009.5, y=5, label= "Mean Year: 2009", color = 'white', size = 4, angle = 90) +
  annotate("text", x = 1994, y=5, label= "Bubble Size indicates number of Votes,\nBubble Color, the genre", color = 'white', size = 4)+
  geom_point(aes(fill = Genre, size = Votes), colour = "white", pch=21) +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), limits = c(1986, 2021)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(2.5, 11)) +
  scale_size(range = c(2, 7), guide = "none")+
   labs(y="TV IMDb Ratings",
           x = "First Episode Year",
       title = "IMDb Most Popular Television Series",
       subtitle = "Average Rating of the Most Popular TV Shows shown across years") +
  theme_opts 



girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.8)))



```
